original_text: The priest is to splash the blood against the altar of the Lord at the entrance to the tent of meeting and burn the fat as an aroma pleasing to the Lord.
korean_text: 제사장은 그 피를 회막 문 여호와의 제단에 뿌리고 그 기름을 불살라 여호와께 향기로운 냄새가 되게 할 것이라

sentences.original_text: The priest is to splash the blood
against the altar of the Lord
at the entrance to the tent of meeting
as an aroma pleasing to the Lord
